# sen-card-title




<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Example

```html
<sen-card>
  <sen-card-title>
    Card tryout title
  </sen-card-title>
</sen-card>
```



## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                  | Description                                                                                           |
| --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--card-font-size-lg` | responsive base font size in breakpoint lg (<1200px) - default inherits --sen-font-size-lg or `16px`  |
| `--card-font-size-md` | responsive base font size in breakpoint md (<992px) - default inherits --sen-font-size-md or `13px`   |
| `--card-font-size-sm` | responsive base font size in breakpoint sm (<768px) - default inherits --sen-font-size-sm or `11px`   |
| `--card-font-size-xl` | responsive base font size in breakpoint xl (>=1200px) - default inherits --sen-font-size-xl or `16px` |
| `--card-font-size-xs` | responsive base font size in breakpoint xs (<576px) - default inherits --sen-font-size-xs or `11px`   |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
